instruction.en:
1.	Insert the AAA battery.
2.	Set the Z-Wave network main controller into learning mode.
3.	Triple or single short press the Z-button.
4.	If the add for inclusion is successful, the LED will blink less than 5 seconds and then keep on 3 seconds. Otherwise, the LED will blink 5 seconds and then turn off, in which case you need to repeat the process from step 2.

hint.en: Door/Window Sensor will send notification report and battery report to the associated nodes.
Sensor will send Basic Set to the associated nodes when the sensor body and magnet removed or combined.
Door/Window Sensor can send BASIC SET command to nodes associated with group 2.
Door/Window Sensor can reverse its value of BASIC SET when the magnet is triggered.
This parameter defines a battery level as the “low battery”.
